title: IFC partners with Axis Bank to provide $500 million climate loan in India
description: The International Finance Corporation is lending $500 million to Axis Bank to develop blue finance and green projects in India. This partnership aims to enhance water and energy efficiency and support climate-friendly investments in sectors like wastewater management and green buildings. Axis Bank targets significant growth in its climate and sustainable finance portfolio by 2030.
